name: Beat the sky
description:
Place your blocks to the beat to reach the sky. 

Controls:

  • Block falls on mouse position
  • W, S      to change view
  • A, D      to rotate block
  • R            to change to next beat
  • P            to open/close the menu and pause/unpause the game
  • Hint:   A good foundation is the key to success ;)

Info:

  • Game made for LudumDare 41 (Puzzle + Rythm).
  • Twitter your highscore to @Thylomer
  • If you enjoyed the game please share 2 Minutes of your time to fill this :)
  • Follow me on twitter to get notified when the game launches in google play

Good look & have fun
